专家敦促欧洲促进五岁以下儿童健康的运动行为由身体活动和儿童健康专家领导的 SUNRISE 欧洲研究小组紧急呼吁欧洲各国采取具体措施，促进五岁以下儿童的健康运动行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Experts-urge-to-promote-healthy-movement-behaviors-in-children-under- Five-in-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Experts-urge-to-promote-healthy-movement-behaviors-in-children-under- Five-in-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2d1c575-6200-417c-9061-fa9d994b20e6 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 22:08:42 -0400 Experts urge to promote healthy movement behaviors in children under five in Europe
